main event: Sighting of an unidentified flying object over Berlin, Germany on January 23, 1954
interesting points: The object was described as silver-colored, estimated to be 20-30 feet in diameter, and appeared to be twice the size of a normal jet fighter aircraft.
The object moved at a speed greatly in excess of any known aircraft at the time.
The object maneuvered in a vertical and horizontal direction and at one point seemed to hover for a few seconds.
The object then accelerated and disappeared from view, with no exhaust trail or sound reported.
The sighting was observed by German military personnel in the vicinity of Berlin and lasted for approximately 3-5 minutes.
